poi-description %s %s: poi v%s is an open source Kancolle browser based on Electron v%s. poi behaves the same as Chrome and does not modify game data, packets or implement bots/macros. The main poi provides basic functionalities and is complemented by a variety of plugins.
You must reboot the app for the changes: You must reboot the app for the changes to take effect.
Some plugins may not work before you ref: Some plugins may not work before you refresh the page.
Failed. Perhaps you don't have permissio: Failed. Perhaps you don't have permission to it.
Set this in the OS X App Menu: Set this in the OS X App Menu.
Warn if the number of free ship slots is: Warn if the number of free ship slots is less than
Warn if the number of free item slots is: Warn if the number of free item slots is less than
If connection error occurs frequently, d: If connection error occurs frequently, delete both of them.
Adaptive resolution based on the window: Adaptive resolution based on the window
